section.name: GUI Component Lookup Types
section.p: FEST provides different ways to lookup a GUI component:

subsection.name: By name
By type
subsection.p: Finding components by type is reliable as long as the GUI under test has only one component of such type.

subsection.name: Custom Search Criteria
subsection.p: There are times when the GUI to test does not provide unique names for their components (e.g. legacy applications.) To overcome this limitation, FEST provides a way to specify custom search criteria using a org.fest.swing.core.GenericTypeMatcher.
Note: GenericTypeMatcher guarantees that the component passed as argument in the method "isMatching" is never null.

section.name: Performing GUI Component Lookup
section.p:
Regardless of the lookup type, FEST provides two ways to perform GUI component lookup:
Using a ContainerFixture
Using ComponentFinder
